==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
===Normal===
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Stretchy Pyro Fungus will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Stretchy Pyro Fungus can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Stretchy Pyro Fungus is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Stretch Spin
|desc_2      = Stretches itself, charges and spins its head around, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, cooldown reduced.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''60% ATK''', knockback increased.
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Stretchy Pyro Fungus Stretch Spin 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Stretchy Pyro Fungus Stretch Spin 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Fungus Befall
|desc_3      = Shoots itself up into the air and crashes down at the player's location, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Physical DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, cooldown reduced.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, AoE increased, DMG increased to '''100% ATK''', knockback increased.
|caption_3   = Normal
|file_3_2    = Stretchy Pyro Fungus Fungus Befall 2
|caption_3_2 = Activated
|file_3_3    = Stretchy Pyro Fungus Fungus Befall 3
|caption_3_3 = Scorched
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.<br />This creature only looks explosive — it is, in fact, a most gentle soul, so long as you don't get too close...|[[Archive]]}}

==Trivia==
* Despite being called a [[Pyro]] enemy, its normal variant has no attacks capable of dealing Pyro damage.
